Chairman.Name: Major Gen Syed Fatemy Ahmed Roomy (Retd)

LeavePolicies.Policy: 16 days after one year of service, distributed across four quarters. Up to 4 days of unused leave per quarter can be encashed.
Maximum of one (01) day can be taken at a time.
Requires a valid medical document for leave exceeding one day.
120 days for confirmed employees with at least 6 months of service.
No leave facilities; any day off in an emergency is considered unpaid leave.
There is currently no policy for parental leave.

LeaveData.LeaveBalanceCheck: Individual remaining leave days can be checked through the ERP system under the 'Leave Interface' section.

SalaryBreakdown.Note: Components are structured as a percentage of the Gross Salary.

EidBonus.Policy: 50% of total gross salary for permanent employees who have completed 6 months of service. Prorated bonus otherwise.

QuarterlyProfitShare.Policy: 15% of the profit shared if the company meets the minimum profit set, for employees who have served for at least one year, calculated on a prorated basis.

MobileBillAllowances.Note: Provided to the operations management team, team leads, and assistant team leads, graded by rank.
